title: S2 Ep31: Learning about ourselves
itunes:title: Learning about ourselves
description: Despite all the evidence to the contrary we continue to overestimate how much work we will do tomorrow, or how often we will go to the gym. Why? Peter Schwardmann tells Tim Phillips that we do learn from experience about ourselves - in the right circumstances.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
